subject: Re: [junit] wait between to tests
msgSnippet: use java code Thread.sleep(n); where n in ms Ranjeet Sahay
messageBody:
use java code Thread.sleep(n); where n in ms

Ranjeet Sahay


Robert Wenner wrote:

> On Saturday 17 January 2004 23:48, Shivanjali wrote:
> > how to wait for sometime between 2 tests?
>
> Why? I want my test run as fast as possible...
>
> Robert
